contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox US Cabinet official |name= James Patton Preston |image=James Patton Preston.jpg |order= [[List of Governors of Virginia|20th]] |title=[[Governor of Virginia]] |term_start=December 1, 1816 |term_end= December 1, 1819 |predecessor=[[Wilson Cary Nicholas]] |successor=[[Thomas Mann Randolph, Jr.]] |birth_date={{birth date|1774|6|21}} |birth_place= [[Montgomery County, Virginia|Montgomery]], [[Virginia Colony|Virginia]] |death_date={{death date and age|1843|5|4|1774|6|21}} |death_place= [[Montgomery County, Virginia|Montgomery]], [[Virginia]], [[United States|USA]] |restingplace= [[Smithfield (Blacksburg, Virginia)|Smithfield Plantation Cemetery]]<br>[[Blacksburg]], [[Virginia]], USA |party=[[Democratic-Republican Party|Democratic-Republican]] |alma_mater= [[College of William & Mary]] |spouse= Ann Barraud Taylor |children= |profession= }} '''James Patton Preston''' (June 21, 1774 â€“ May 4, 1843) was a [[United States of America|U.S.]] [[political figure]]. He served as the [[List of Governors of Virginia|20th]] [[Governor of Virginia]] between 1816 and 1819. He was the brother-in-law of [[John Floyd (Virginia politician)|John Floyd]] and uncle of [[James McDowell]] and [[John Buchanan Floyd]]. [[Preston County, West Virginia]] was formed in 1818 and named in Governor Preston's honor. == External links == * {{Find a Grave|7727707}} ;Archival Records *[http://ead.lib.virginia.edu/vivaead/published/lva/vi00880.xml.frame A Guide to the Governor James Patton Preston Executive Papers, 1816-1819] at [http://www.lva.virginia.gov/ The Library of Virginia] {{s-start}} {{s-off}} {{succession box | before= [[Wilson Cary Nicholas]] | title= [[Governor of Virginia]] | years= 1816–1819 | after= [[Thomas Mann Randolph, Jr.]] }} {{s-end}} {{Governors of Virginia}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Patton Preston, James | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American politician | DATE OF BIRTH = June 21, 1774 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1853 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Patton Preston, James}} [[Category:1774 births]] [[Category:1853 deaths]] [[Category:People from Montgomery County, Virginia]] [[Category:Governors of Virginia]] [[Category:Virginia Democratic-Republicans]] {{Virginia-politician-stub}}
